name: Cheryl TOCCO, Appellant, v. John TOCCO, Appellee
docket_number: Appeal No. 167 Eastern District Appeal Docket 1990

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
parties: Cheryl TOCCO, Appellant, v. John TOCCO, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The opinion and order of the Superior Court, 389 Pa.Super. 310, 567 A.2d 303, are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Laurence M. Kelly, Montrose, for appellant.
Joseph P. Hester, Jr., Montrose, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
590 A.2d 1255
Cheryl TOCCO, Appellant, v. John TOCCO, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted: April 11, 1991.
Decided May 24, 1991.
Laurence M. Kelly, Montrose, for appellant.
Joseph P. Hester, Jr., Montrose, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
